Package be.ac.umons.model.hexagon

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Amplifier
    Hexagon that amplify the intensity of an incoming laser
    Bridge
    Base class of GenericBridge and SpecificBridge
    Converter
    Hexagon that converts the color of an incoming laser
    Empty
    An empty hexagon that doesn't modify the laser
    Filter
    Hexagon that only lets certain colors of the lasers traverse it
    Gate
    Hexagon that lets the laser pass only by two opposite edges.
    GenericBridge
    Hexagon that contains two or three bridges which let pass any laser
    Hexagon
    Base class for all classes representing an hexagon on the map
    Mirror
    Base class of OneWayMirror, TwoWayMirror and ThreeWayMirror
    Modifier  
    OneWayMirror
    Hexagon that contains a single flat mirror with one side of the mirror reflecting the lasers
    Reducer
    Hexagon that reduces the intensity of an incoming laser
    Source
    Hexagon emitting the lasers It contains its starting laser
    SpecificBridge
    Hexagon that contains two or three bridges which let pass lasers of a specific color
    Splitter
    Hexagon that divides the laser in a number of new lasers with reduced intensity
    Target
    Hexagon that the lasers have to reach for completing the level
    ThreeWayMirror
    Hexagon that contains a triangular mirror reflecting the lasers by 60
    TwoWayMirror
    Hexagon that contains a single flat mirror with the two sides of the mirror reflecting the lasers
    Wall
    Hexagon that stops the lasers
